document.full_text: toyota motor corp  on monday warned that the uncertain supply of parts from japan could threaten its output of vehicles through july, the latest sign of trouble for the global auto industry stemming from the massive japanese earthquake a month ago.
document.title: japan supply uncertainty looms for toyota
lines_and_colors: toyota motor corp  on monday warned that the uncertain supply of parts from japan could threaten its output of vehicles through july, the latest sign of trouble for the global auto industry stemming from the massive japanese earthquake a month ago.
